Body:
SAMPLE_CODE1 = """

class B(object):
    CONSTANT = 1

    def foo(self):
        return self.CONSTANT
"""
SAMPLE_CODE2 = """


class B(object):
    CONSTANT = 1

    @classmethod
    def __xreload_after_reload_update__(cls):
        cls.CONSTANT = 2

    def foo(self):
        return self.CONSTANT
"""
self.make_mod(sample=SAMPLE_CODE1)
import x
foo = x.B().foo
self.assertEqual(foo(), 1)
self.make_mod(sample=SAMPLE_CODE2)
pydevd_reload.xreload(x)
self.assertEqual(foo(), 2)
